Instruction: Combine milk, egg yolks, and vanilla in a large bowl. Add flour, sugar, salt, and melted butter; mix until well blended.

Heat a crepe pan over medium heat until hot. Grease the pan with vegetable oil or cooking spray. Pour approximately 1/4 cup of batter into the pan and swirl to spread evenly. Flip the crepe when bubbles form on the top and edges are dry, then cook until lightly browned on the other side. Repeat with the rest of the batter.
Fill the crepes with fruits, cream, caramel, ice cream, or cheese of your choice before serving.
